I mean, it's illumination. It's clarity. It's truth. It's the reality of God. It's the presence of God. And really, all of those things pretty neatly mushed together into one thing. And what does it all start with? There's this light that is dawned. Jesus knows that. He knows exactly what he's drawing on there. Matthew knows that. He knows what he's drawing on. <description><p>Person driving in the car who sang those songs and who has the kid who's studying John 1 in Latin; email me at <a href= "mailto:thetmbh@gmail.com">thetmbh@gmail.com</a> so we can get lunch. And seriously, it was for the best that you didn't do Shine Down Your Light on Me in church - those people weren't ready.</p> <p> </p> <p>Thank you to everyone who supports the program at <a href= "https://www.patreon.com/thetmbhpodcast">patreon.com/thetmbhpodcast</a> </p> <p>You're the reason I can do this!</p> <p><a href= "https://www.reddit.com/r/tmbhpodcast/comments/fc5cyq/week_20_discussion_0096_0100/"> Discuss this episode here!</a></p> <p> </p> <p>Music rotation written and performed by Jeff Foote.</p></description>
<content:encoded><p>Person driving in the car who sang those songs and who has the kid who's studying John 1 in Latin; email me at <a href= "mailto:thetmbh@gmail.com">thetmbh@gmail.com</a> so we can get lunch. And seriously, it was for the best that you didn't do Shine Down Your Light on Me in church - those people weren't ready.</p> <p> </p> <p>Thank you to everyone who supports the program at <a href= "https://www.patreon.com/thetmbhpodcast">patreon.com/thetmbhpodcast</a> </p> <p>You're the reason I can do this!</p> <p><a href= "https://www.reddit.com/r/tmbhpodcast/comments/fc5cyq/week_20_discussion_0096_0100/"> Discuss this episode here!</a></p> <p> </p> <p>Music rotation written and performed by Jeff Foote.</p></content:encoded>
